item.title: We Need More Surveillance
item.description: Anatomy of our planetary skin The skin of our planetary body is covered by sensors, actuators, wires, radars, cameras, turbines, transistors, and circuits that power modernity. A future without these technologies is unthinkable. On an individual level, the luxuries we enjoy would not exist without them. Accessing the rest of humanity through the black brick we compulsively turn on means relying on the constant whirring of these connective technologies.
